definition: to seal/to confirm/to corroborate/to verify
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Discover the mystery and fun of science.
sentences.chinese: 透過外師的引導，印證科學的奧妙與樂趣。

sentences.english: Sanxia Photo, Evidence of Our Love.
There is another example in accord with the curse.
sentences.chinese: 最近又有個例子印證了這一魔咒。

sentences.english: The Pfauter Group's activity is proof that its founder successfully developed it.
sentences.chinese: 普發特集團的活躍是它的創建者對它成功發展的印證。

sentences.english: He has published five individual albums like the "Consciousness and Confirmation".
sentences.chinese: 出版有《覺悟與印證》等個人畫集五部。

sentences.english: The rcents spikes in outbreaks in Europe are a clear sign to researchers that the effect of climate on the diseases has to be taken seriously.
sentences.chinese: 近期突發的藍舌病更加印證了氣候因素對該病的影響。

sentences.english: Firstly, instituting a printing permit system.
This perception has been proved during the talks.
sentences.chinese: 這個看法在這次會談中也有所印證。

sentences.english: Repeated exposés and numerous reports tend to confirm this.
sentences.chinese: 反覆的曝光和大量的報道似乎印證着這個觀點。

sentences.english: It turns out that love on campus is commonly short and dreamful.
sentences.chinese: 這印證了校園愛情往往只是短暫的夢想。

sentences.english: Who shall bring to perfection the well-taught path of wisdom as an expert garland-maker would his floral design?
sentences.chinese: 誰能如熟練的花匠採花般，印證善說的真理之道？

sentences.english: Both the Linux and fetchmail projects show evidence of this.
The reality is indeed confirmed Lee Sang Yu said.
sentences.chinese: 現實情況確實印證了李相禹所言。

sentences.english: Maybe there is something to what Mayweather Sr. said.
sentences.chinese: 也許有些事情印證了老梅所說的。

sentences.english: Skin biopsies have determined that many whales are now suffering from severe sunburns.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚活檢印證了很多鯨魚在遭受日曬灼傷。

sentences.english: The terms of pre East German seem in support of this indication.
sentences.chinese: 德東人的國族認同似乎印證此一說法。

definition: to embody/to reflect/to incarnate
to manifest
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
appearance/to appear
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
no doubt/undoubtedly
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
